searches.name: crypto-alpha
searches.prompt: Show me tweets about crypto trading alpha and market analysis

searches.name: polymarket
searches.prompt: Show me latest tweets from @polymarket @PolymarketIntel @GlydoAlerts about prediction market odds and whale activity

searches.name: What are the recent crypto events and news
searches.prompt: Show me all the recent tweets from the crypto event, I want to see different KOL content in the crytpo event

searches.name: Crypto conferences and events
searches.prompt: show me recent tweets about KOL in attending crypto conference and events.

searches.name: Polymarket event
searches.prompt: show me the recent polymarket insider trading events, find the top relevance tweets, and find those people who exposing them as an insider
